typeSettings.text:
Elevate titles contain interactive features called 
widgets - these come in a variety of forms, from audio 
and video material, image galleries, external links, 
and assessment material. At a title level, tracking 
widgets use can be a useful indicator of popular 
features that may be worth further investment or, 
conversely, underused features that require 
reexamination.

NOTE that Widget interactions are 
not currently segregated into paid/trial users.
